description:
Compared to Upper Lowe Ravine, this canyon has much lower quality features, and some poison oak issues.

Approach

Altadena Crest Trail to firebreak.

Descent

R1: 30' - bush

R2: 15' - bush

R1 and R2 can be combined which would likely lead to using about 160' of rope.

R3: 30' - bush

R4: 120' - tree with long extension made from dynamic rope. Money rappel with a cool view over the Eaton drainage.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Lowe Ravine (Lower)
